Title: The Catcher in the Rye
Description: A classic coming-of-age novel about a young boy named Holden Caulfield.

Title: To Kill a Mockingbird
Description: Set in the 1930s, this novel addresses issues of race, class, and morality through the eyes of Scout Finch.
A dystopian novel that explores themes of totalitarianism and government surveillance.

Title: The Great Gatsby
Description: Set in the Roaring Twenties, this novel depicts the lavish and tumultuous lives of the wealthy elite.

Title: Pride and Prejudice
Description: A classic romantic novel that follows the complex relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

Title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
Description: This epic novel follows the multi-generational Buendia family in the fictional town of Macondo.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, introducing the magical world of Hogwarts.

Title: The Hobbit
Description: The classic fantasy adventure novel about Bilbo Baggins and his journey to the Lonely Mountain.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: The first installment in the epic fantasy trilogy that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.

Title: The Alchemist
Description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd boy named Santiago on a journey to find his Personal Legend.
